qas.question: Like a Prayer reflects Madonna's relationship with who?
In which video did Madonna wear a rosary?
In which video does it show Madonna being scolded by her boss in Italian?
She dedicated Papa Don't Preach to whom?

context: Madonna's <a0_0>Italian-Catholic<a0_0/> background and her relationship with <a1_0>her parents<a1_0/> are reflected in the album Like a Prayer. It was an evocation of the impact religion had on her career. Her video for the title track contains Catholic symbolism, such as the stigmata. During The Virgin Tour, she wore a rosary and prayed with it in the music video for "<a2_0>La Isla Bonita"<a2_0/>. The "<a3_0>Open Your Heart<a3_0/>" video sees her boss scolding her in the Italian language. On the Who's That Girl World Tour, she dedicated the song "Papa Don't Preach" to <a4_0>Pope John Paul II.
